concept.title: About Auto Scaling During Upgrade
concept.shortdesc: This topic describes considerations for auto scaling during the upgrade process.

conbody.p: recommends suspending autoscaling before instance migrations begin, then resuming autoscaling after the entire upgrade is complete.

The reasoning behind this recommendation is that, while you are packing/unpacking and migrating instances, it would be difficult to track (by numbers of instances at least) if the autoscaling process were also starting/stopping instances at the same time.

The instances that are being started/stopped by autoscaling are meant to be transient, so you wouldn't normally pack or unpack those anyway, but their presence and their (dis)appearing can be confusing as you're listing the other instances you do want to pack.
